page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: The people of Arborfield can ride,swim,play tennis or play at parks.There are riding stables at REME Saddle Club,Langley Pond Livery Stables,Handpost Farm and Cross Lanes Farm.REME Saddle Club is in the Garrison.Langley Pond Livery Stables,in School Road,charges you to keep your pony there and unless you have your own pony you can't ride.Cross Lanes Farm and REME Saddle Club have indoor schools.There are 2 libraries in the village,both mobile.One opens every Wednesday and stops outside the village shop while the other stops at the park on Tuesdays.There are football teams,a gardening association.The people in the village also use a sports centre in the garrison which includes swimming,badminton and tennis etc.
